message.content:
1. Eat a balanced diet: It's essential to eat a variety of fruits, vegetables, grains, and protein every day. This will provide your body with the necessary nutrients such as vitamins, minerals, and fiber that can support optimal growth.

2. Get enough sleep: Sleep is essential for proper growth since it releases growth hormones during deep slumber stages which contributes to cell repair and regeneration.

3. Exercise regularly: Engaging in physical activity can help improve blood circulation and aid in overall muscle development ensuring better strength for future height gains.

4. Maintain good posture: Maintaining an upright posture helps elongate your spine making you appear taller; avoid hunching or slouching when sitting or standing.

5. Avoid tobacco products, alcohol consumption over recommended limits(do not consume any alcohl please ), drugs(Marijana ) these substances may impair your ability to grow fully by stunting overall bone density during crucial developmental years (teenage years)

6.Stay Hydrated – Keep drinking water on regular intervals this leads to better supply of nutrients required

7.Practice certain Stretch Exercises like yoga poses (cat pose), hanging exercises from bars(curve stretching ), touch toes while keeping knees straight curbing hip muscles , etc
  
8.Confidence- Some people might appear slightly shorter because they often slump their shoulders or curve their backs in response to low self-esteem

9.Stress management – Pay attention on managing stress level through meditation & other healthy habits i.e Limiting screentime before bed,paying attention towards studies , Indulge yourself into co-curricular activities as high cortisol levels ultimately deteriorates height gain
